featured.text: 28 , the idea of Blue Monday persists.
But eye contact which persists longer than that can make us nervous.

definition.zh_def: 持續存在或繼續進行，尤其是在困難或挑戰中。
definition.en_def: To continue firmly or obstinately in a course of action despite difficulty or opposition.
definition.example: She decided to persist in her studies despite the challenges she faced.
